name: Destruction Swordsman Fusion
text: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster that mentions "Buster Blader" as material from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or either field as Fusion Material. If this card is in your GY: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY; add this card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Destruction Swordsman Fusion" once per turn.
